events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund or exchange.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund because they requested money back or an exchange.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer's jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the refund or exchange process for your jacket order.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket was tried on indoors only, to ensure our return policy is followed?
My order number is 587462 and I only tried the jacket on indoors, it wasn't worn outside or damaged in any way.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label to send the jacket back.
Great, thanks for your quick response. I appreciate the easy refund process and the prepaid label offer.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. You will receive an email shortly with the return label and refund confirmation.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and that the refund process is going smoothly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
